hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Managed Inputs aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/ #studyids=("hvh")
IFS=$'\r\n' GLOBIGNORE='*' command eval 'studyids=($(cut -d , -f 1 data/Managed_Inputs.csv | grep -v Study\ Abbr | uniq))'
find data/ -exec rm -rf {} /;
mkdir completed
mkdir data
#### get all subject multi files, job.config and patient mapping file from each study for studyid in ${studyids[@]}; do
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv data/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*subject.multi*.txt" --include "*Subject.Multi*.txt" --include "*Subject.MULTI*.txt" --include "*subject.MULTI*.txt"
done
java -jar jars/HPDSPatientNumTracker.jar --revengineer
aws s3 cp completed/PatientPool.txt s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/
